column8: Front pages,, all your pictures,, they make you look so small
column9: How could someone not miss you at all
column11: I'd never mistreat you,, I'm not a criminal
column12: I speak a different language,, but I still hear your call
column16: Let me be the one to
column17: Light a fire inside those eyes
column18: You feel lonely,, you don't even know me
column19: But I can feel you crying
column21: Let me be the one to
column22: Lift your heart up and save your life
column23: I don't think you even realize

column42: I swear I'd never put you down
